Reference

All functions

bind_data()

Bind data to project

change_set()

Change active parameter set

check_rmaverick_loaded()

Check that rmaverick package has loaded successfully

delete_set()

Delete parameter set

get_qmatrix()

Extract q-matrix for a given analysis

is.mavproject()

Determine if object is of class mavproject

maverick_file()

Import file

mavproject()

Create a new rmaverick project

new_set()

Create new parameter set

plot_GTI_path()

Plot GTI path of current active set

plot_acf()

Produce MCMC autocorrelation plot

plot_alpha()

Produce diagnostic plots of parameter alpha

plot_density()

Produce MCMC density plot

plot_logevidence_K()

Plot log-evidence estimates over K

plot_logevidence_model()

Plot log-evidence estimates over parameter sets

plot_loglike()

Produce diagnostic plots of log-likelihood

plot_loglike_quantiles()

Plot loglike quantiles of current active set

plot_posterior_K()

Plot posterior K

plot_posterior_model()

Plot posterior model

plot_qmatrix()

Plot Q-matrix of current active set

plot_trace()

Produce MCMC trace plot

print(<mavproject>)

Custom print function for class mavproject

print_full()

Ordinary print function for class mavproject

recalculate_evidence()

Recalculate evidence and posterior estimates

rmaverick

Analysis of genetic population structure via thermodynamic integration.

run_mcmc()

Run main MCMC

sim_data()

Simulate data

summary(<mavproject>)

Print summary for class mavproject
